subItems.name: Bacon Double XL Meal
subItems.description: Make room for our own Bacon Double XL, featuring two signature fire-grilled beef patties topped with savoury smoked bacon and melted American cheese, all in our toasted sesame seed bun. Served with large fries or onion rings and a soft drink of your choice.

subItems.name: Double WHOPPER® Meal
subItems.description: Our Double WHOPPER Sandwich is a pairing of two flame-grilled beef patties topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun. Served with large fries or onion rings and a soft drink of your choice.

subItems.name: Chicken Royale Meal
subItems.description: Our crowning glory the Chicken Royale is everything a great sandwich should be. Tasty chicken wrapped in a special crisp coating, topped with iceberg lettuce, creamy mayonnaise and crowned with a toasted sesame seed bun. Served with large fries or onion rings and a soft drink of your choice.

subItems.name: Double Cheeseburger
subItems.description: Make room for our Double Cheeseburger, two signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with melted American cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.
